mapper.sql: id, task_id, name, story_point, priority, description, pos_id
mapper.insert: insert into story (id, task_id, name, story_point, priority, description, pos_id, acceptance) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storyPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptance,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update story
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
story_point = #{storyPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pos_id = #{posId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
acceptance = #{acceptance,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
